column2: n.pl. 1 ratio between the amounts staked by the parties to a bet, based on the expected probability either way. 2 balance of probability or advantage (the odds are against it; the odds are in your favour). 3 difference giving an advantage (it makes no odds).  at odds (often foll. By with) in conflict or at variance. Over the odds above the normal price etc. [apparently from *odd]
